title: MTA allocation to MTA/WMATIC/WETH Balancer Pool on Polygon
body:
This motion seeks to allocate 15,000 MTA per week to the [MTA/WMATIC/WETH Balancer Pool](https://polygon.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x614b5038611729ed49e0ded154d8a5d3af9d1d9e00010000000000000000001d) for a duration of 2 weeks. After the 2 weeks, it should be evaluated if this incentivization should continue or be adjusted.

This pool would allow users to provide liquidity and to swap from and to MTA. Additionally, this will create a use case for MTA on Polygon and bind more of the circulating supply to liquidity positions.

This allocation is within the 20% that was approved by the earlier proposal [MCCP 7](https://mips.mstable.org/MCCP/mccp-7.html). 

**Should we allocate 15,000 MTA per week to this pool for 2 weeks?**
author: 0xE76Be9C1e10910d6Bc6b63D8031729747910c2f6
